Reviews.Title: not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Vanessa johnson
Reviews.Content: This phone will not work for my sim card. I have family mobile by tmobile and it does not work. I hope the company contacts me soon to fix this problem.

Reviews.Title: not compatible for USA carriers
Reviews.Author: alfred
Reviews.Content: this product is really nice, no doubt about it. atleast for the price you pay. the main issue here is it uses a frequency band of 900/1800 for 2G and 2100 WCDMA for 3G. unfortunately, if u are in USA, those frequencies are not what u have. u need 850/1900/1700/2100. no USA carrier(AT&T;, TMOBILE, etc) works on it. so make sure u ask your mobile network for frequency band before u buy any phone. all other stuff looks good.

Reviews.Title: Dissappointment
Reviews.Author: Zipporah
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay but it does not come with direction to tell you how to remote certain settings. I keep getting messages in Chinese as well that I cannot get rid of. In addition to it having not very clear sound quality, the headphone plug is very small so it does work with regular head phones, AUX jacks or anything that would require a regular headphone. And Lastly, I have been having trouble downloading more then two apps. So overall its okay if you need a phone but if you are looking for something with good quality this product I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: Mz Yatta
Reviews.Content: Just bought this product mt T-Mobile sim is not working only my wifi took it to both stores and they could not reach the servers???? Answers Please...other than using this for tablet use only?

Reviews.Title: Android Mega Note
Reviews.Author: VCCI
Reviews.Content: Two main issues:1. Unlocked; but locked in to ATT/Tmobile sim cards only. Other service providers using ATT/Tmobile towers issue their own sim cards; will not work in this phone. Need to get unlock code to fully unlock this phone or use WIFI with GoogleVoice.2. Battery drain very fast.Everything else work just fine.

Reviews.Title: not worth the money
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: The phone is not very good its a peice of junk the should not eavin be selling it is a peice of junk i can not eavin use the words to discribe it i have bought from these people and no problem but this item did not funktion since i opened the box nothing but promblems sorry but the truth is the truth also i bought the phone to take to mexico where i live half the year now the want me to send it back the postage from hear to them would cost me about35,dollors so now.im stuck with it
